Mr Eric Schmidt said that Google had strengthened procedures to ensure that controversial issues such as StreetView( where Google's camera cars inadvertently collected personal data) were not repeated. It is reality that when we release products we have to be sensitive to regulatory and privacy issues, he said. "So we now do extensive reviews[ and] we're pretty happy with that balance now. in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks

"( Allen Iverson ) will not be able to return to professional basketball for some six to eight weeks or more this season," Andrews said in a statement sent out by Allen Iverson 's manager, Gary Moore . At this point, it is certainly more important to get his calf healed and asymptomatic than it is to try to play with continued pain. We anticipate a full recovery and certainly anticipate him being able to resume a normal basketball career.
